welcomeSubtitle: Please sign in or sign up to continue
signup_for_more_results: Sign up to see more results
feature1Desc: Create, manage, and track your influencer campaigns from start to finish. Set goals, define deliverables, and monitor performance in real-time.
feature2Desc: Find the perfect influencers for your brand with our advanced search and filtering capabilities. Explore detailed profiles, audience insights, and past collaborations.
feature3Desc: Seamlessly communicate and collaborate with influencers. Share briefs, review content, and manage payments all in one place.

campaign_setup_steps: Setup your influencer campaign in 4 steps
brand_dashboard_welcome: Welcome! Manage your influencer campaigns here.

influencer_dashboard_welcome: Welcome! Discover new brand deals here.

earnings_info: Track your income from brand collaborations.

serviceDesc: CollabConnect provides a comprehensive suite of tools to streamline your influencer marketing efforts.
landingTitle: Connect with the Best Influencers Instantly
landingSubtitle: Collab Connect  helps brands find top Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube influencers effortlessly.
service1Desc: Search influencers by keyword, platform, or engagement rate.
service1Brag: Thousands of influencers at your fingertips!
service2Desc: Connect directly with influencers and start collaborations.
service3Desc: Track influencer performance, engagement, and ROI.
collab_subtitle: Bridge brands and creators with campaign management, automated submissions, reward tracking, and unified discovery across 5 platforms.
corePurpose: To make influencer collaboration fast, fair and data-driven, empowering creators and simplifying brand marketing.
feature_smart_discovery_desc: Filter creators by platform, industry, audience size, and engagement. Real-time insights from creator profiles and campaign performance.
feature_automated_campaigns_desc: Post ad requests, manage submissions, approve/reject content, and track scheduling and submissions in one flow.
feature_rewards_desc: Influencers earn rewards and points for successful campaigns. Auto-payout to influencers after 7 days if brand doesn't respond.
heroSubtagline: Bridge brands and creators ‚Äî campaigns that are fast, fair, and measurable.
